**Government Tender Announcement**
### Tender Details
- **Title** (English/French): Education and Library Services for Springhill Institution / Services d'éducation et de bibliothèque - Établissement de Springhill
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01009211
- **Solicitation Number**: 21208-23-4140546/C
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 21, 2022 at 1:00 PM ET
- **Contracting Authority**: Matthew Couture, matthew.couture@csc-scc.gc.ca, 506-378-8730

### Overview
The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking bids for Education and Library Services at Springhill Institution. This requirement aims to facilitate reintegration by increasing educational skill levels through accredited programs and providing library services equivalent to those in the community.

### Scope of Work
- The contractor will provide education and library services to inmates at Springhill Institution under the Correctional Service of Canada's policies and guidelines.
- Educational services will include taking attendance, maintaining accurate records of inmate credits and achievements, and submitting reports to the Project Authority.
- Library services will be provided to inmates, with a focus on maintaining a library similar to those in the community, taking into account the correctional environment.

### Deliverables
- Attendance records and accurate records of inmate credits and achievements will be maintained in real time.
- Interim and final reports will be submitted to the Project Authority.
- Data reports will be provided upon request.

### Term of Contract
- The work is to be performed from December 1, 2022 to March 31, 2024, with an option for a one-year renewal.
- The evaluation criteria and statement of work can be obtained from the Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders website.

### Important Notes
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
- After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

### Seminar and Event Information
- Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers free seminars to businesses interested in selling goods and services to the Government of Canada.
